mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO at_sale_rec ( ID, FID, FBillNo, FSalesNo, FOrgID, FOrgNumber, FOrgName, FDate, FSaleType, FSaleTypeName, FSrcEntryID, FSetType, FSetTypeName, FMemberID, FPayMoney, FRemark, FCreateBy, FCreateDate, FUpdateBy, FUpdateDate, sync_flag, sync_time ) VALUES ( #{ID}, #{FID}, #{FBillNo}, #{FSalesNo}, #{FOrgID}, #{FOrgNumber}, #{FOrgName}, #{FDate}, #{FSaleType}, #{FSaleTypeName}, #{FSrcEntryID}, #{FSetType}, #{FSetTypeName}, #{FMemberID}, #{FPayMoney}, #{FRemark}, #{FCreateBy}, #{FCreateDate}, #{FUpdateBy}, #{FUpdateDate}, #{sync_flag}, #{sync_time} )

INSERT IGNORE INTO at_sale_rec ( ID, FID, FBillNo, FSalesNo, FOrgID, FOrgNumber, FOrgName, FDate, FSaleType, FSaleTypeName, FSrcEntryID, FSetType, FSetTypeName, FMemberID, FPayMoney, FRemark, FCreateBy, FCreateDate, FUpdateBy, FUpdateDate, sync_flag, sync_time ) VALUES
( #{item.ID}, #{item.FID}, #{item.FBillNo}, #{item.FSalesNo}, #{item.FOrgID}, #{item.FOrgNumber}, #{item.FOrgName}, #{item.FDate}, #{item.FSaleType}, #{item.FSaleTypeName}, #{item.FSrcEntryID}, #{item.FSetType}, #{item.FSetTypeName}, #{item.FMemberID}, #{item.FPayMoney}, #{item.FRemark}, #{item.FCreateBy}, #{item.FCreateDate}, #{item.FUpdateBy}, #{item.FUpdateDate}, #{item.sync_flag}, #{item.sync_time} )
